newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SNP subsidiaries sell off properties.
newsitem.headline: SNP subsidiaries sell off properties.

text.p: Printing and publishing firm SNP Corp Ltd said on Tuesday that its subsidiaries sold two parcels of properties in Singapore for S$3.26 million.
The sale is conditional and must be approved by the Housing and Development Board, a company statement said.
Both were used before as bookshops and the company is expected to gain about S$1.6 million from their sale.
Sale proceeds will be used to repay loans by SNP and is expected to increase the firm's earnings per share as well as the net tangible net assets per share by 2.78 cents.
